query:
SELECT
            EXISTS(
                SELECT 1 FROM delphi_issue_details_with_statuses didws
                WHERE didws.project_id = $1 AND didws.status = 'pending'
            ) AS "pending_issue_details_exist!",
            t.id AS "thread_id: DBThreadId"
        FROM mods m
        INNER JOIN threads t ON t.mod_id = $1
